1190960.name: Fantasy Grounds - Mini-Dungeon Monthly #5 (5E)
1190960.description:
Mini-Dungeon Monthly #5


Mini-Dungeon Monthly is the official monthly RPG zine by AAW Games!
Each issue features five brand-new Mini-Dungeon adventures for 5th Edition.
Five adventures included!
Under Busy Streets
An urban adventure for three to four characters of 1st-2nd level by Justin Andrew Mason
Chaos & Corruption in the Briny Depths
An underwater adventure for four to six characters of 2nd-3rd level by
Jonathan G. Nelson
Umbravania: The Lost Expedition
A mummy's tomb adventure for three to four characters of 6th-8th level by
Justin Andrew Mason
Forging On!
An underground forge adventure for four to five characters of 13th-14th level by
Stephen Yeardley
Bringing Law & Order to Planar Travel Across the Multiverse
A planar adventure for four to six characters of 15th-18th level by
Jonathan G. Nelson
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Theodore Story, and Anthony Rush
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
